dcterms:creator: G. Heusch
A. George
D. Geissbühler
Z. Mostaani
S. Marcel
dcterms:description: The PADISI-Face dataset includes various major face spoofing attack types, captured in a 60-frame sequence of high-resolution images, providing a diverse set of presentation attacks for evaluation in continual learning settings.
dcterms:title: PADISI-Face Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Heusch
A. George
D. Geissbühler
Z. Mostaani
S. Marcel
dcterms:description: The HQ-WMCA dataset is a face anti-spoofing dataset that includes a variety of attack types, designed to evaluate the performance of face presentation attack detection systems.
dcterms:title: HQ-WMCA

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
J. Stehouwer
A. Jourabloo
X. Liu
dcterms:description: The SiW-M dataset is a face anti-spoofing dataset that includes various attack types, aimed at evaluating zero-shot learning approaches for face presentation attack detection.
dcterms:title: SiW-M

dcterms:creator: S. Zhang
A. Liu
J. Wan
Y. Liang
G. Guo
S. Escalera
H. J. Escalante
S. Z. Li
dcterms:description: CASIA-SURF is a large-scale multi-modal benchmark dataset for face anti-spoofing, providing a comprehensive set of data for evaluating various anti-spoofing algorithms.
dcterms:title: CASIA-SURF
